name: Meatpause
tagline: Click to pause and resume Meatspace V2 videos
body:
Just drag the link to the toolbar, as per usual.

[MeatPause](javascript:(function()%7B(%20function()%20%7Bdocument.addEventListener(%20'click'%2C%20function(%20event%20)%20%7Bvar%20target%20%3D%20event.target%20%7C%7C%20null%3Bif%20(%20!target%20%7C%7C%20target.nodeName%20!%3D%3D%20'VIDEO'%20)%20return%3Bif%20(%20target.paused%20)%20%7Btarget.play()%3B%7D%20else%20%7Btarget.pause()%3B%7D%7D)%3B%7D)()%7D)())
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
